result.name: gross-hourly-pay-annual-survey-of-hours-and-earnings
result.notes: The Annual Survey of Hours and Earnings (ASHE) is a UK wide survey that provides a wide range of information on earnings and hours worked.

organization.name: open-data-ni
organization.title: OpenDataNI
organization.description:
[OpenDataNI] (https://www.opendatani.gov.uk) is the brand name for the Open Data portal which facilitates easy access to Northern Ireland public sector data for both reuse and redistribution. 

OpenDataNI has been developed as part of the Digital NI initiative. Digital NI aims to help establish a culture within Northern Ireland that develops and enhances Digital capability not just through interactions with Government, but also with local companies and throughout communities. Within government the Digital Transformation Service is facilitating this cultural shift through a number of methods, transforming Government services, making data open and available and encouraging and coaching those who lack digital skills.

It is recognised that opening up our data is the right thing to do in terms of transparency, accountability and efficiency of the Public Sector in Northern Ireland. It has the potential to encourage new commercial opportunities and drive economic growth and innovation across public and private sectors.

result.title: Gross Hourly Pay - Annual Survey of Hours and Earnings

extras.value: Annual Survey of Hours and Earnings (ASHE): Gross Hourly Pay, excluding overtime by full-time / part-time and gender by Local Government District, Local Government District 2014, Assembly Area and Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics 3 (NUTS3). The survey information is related to the pay-week (or other pay-period if the employee was paid less frequently) which was in April, and to employees on adult rates whose pay for the survey pay-period was not affected by absence. ASHE is a sample survey and uses Her Majesty’s Revenue and Customs (HMRC) PAYE system as the main sampling frame. Numbers that too small to provide a reliable estimate have all been replaced with *. The datasets do not show information about identifiable people or private businesses. No data is provided for cells that are unavailable, unreliable, disclosive, and not applicable or nil/negligible.

resources.description: Annual Survey of Hours and Earnings (ASHE): Gross Hourly Pay, excluding overtime by full-time / part-time and gender by Local Government District, Local Government District 2014, Assembly Area and Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics 3 (NUTS3).
